metadata.description: Papercutz parodies the hot YA series in the fourth volume of Papercutz Slices. Ratkiss Everspleen decides to take her sister Dim's place in the annual televised 'Battle to the Death,' even though Mayor Underwear insists participation is completely optional. Ratkiss and her fellow contestant Peek A Choo soon begin training under Heybitch Blubbernasty for the most unnecessary battle of their lives. Expect laughs galore in this pointed parody that pokes fun at everything from Glee to Winnie-the-Pooh.
metadata.name: Papercutz Slices: The Hunger Pains
